meanings.definition: A type of anticoagulant found in leech saliva.
meanings.sent1: The hirudins in leech saliva help to keep the blood flowing smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes use hirudins from leeches to prevent blood clots in patients.
meanings.sent3: The hirudins in leech saliva are like tiny helpers keeping the blood from getting too thick.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as hirudins, preventing any tension or conflict from clotting their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The hirudins in leech saliva are like little traffic controllers, ensuring the blood doesn't get stuck in one place.

meanings.definition: Plural form of hirudin, a protein in leech saliva that prevents blood clotting.
meanings.sent1: Many hirudins work together in leech saliva to stop blood from clotting.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the hirudins in leech saliva to understand their anticoagulant properties.
meanings.sent3: The hirudins in leech saliva threw a party to celebrate their success in keeping the blood flowing.
meanings.sent4: Their unity was like hirudins, preventing any division or separation among them.
meanings.sent5: The hirudins in leech saliva are like vigilant guards, ensuring the blood remains fluid and free.
